text: is a Japanese idol, singer, and actress. She has released a number of DVDs. She is best known for her role as Remi Freedle in Chousei Kantai Sazer-X. Matsuyama cosplayed as Mao Ran, a character in a video game titled Fighting Beauty Wulong. In 2006, she portrayed Shiori in Gal Circle. In 2007, Matsuyama released her debut single entitled "Matataku Mami: Mitsumete Hoshii". She also starred in the television drama Body Conscious Cop in that year. ==Filmography== ===Films=== * Chousei Kantai Sazer-X the Movie: Fight! Star Warriors (2005), Remi Freedle * Kurosagi (2008) ===Television=== * Chousei Kantai Sazer-X (2005–2006), Remi Freedle * Gal Circle (2006), Shiori * Body Conscious Cop (2007) ==Discography== ===Singles=== * "Matataku Mami: Mitsumete Hoshii" (2007) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Japanese gravure idols Category:Japanese television personalities Category:Living people Category:1988 births
title: Mami Matsuyama
